</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets a coefficient for animation speed (0.5 will play animations half the speed, 2 twice the speed).<br>
Doesn't affect upper body animations (reloading, etc.) </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[setAnimSpeedCoef]] coef </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> coef: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setAnimSpeedCoef]] 0.75;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3 Stamina]], [[getAnimSpeedCoef]], [[setAccTime]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on November 14, 2016 - 03:30
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]
<dd class="note">Increasing animation speed of a unit also increases its run/walk speed (thanks to [[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone Kid]])

<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 27, 2016 - 02:02
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]
<dd class="note">Setting negative values with this makes animations act in reverse or make you stuck sliding in unknown directions.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
